Plague Rat.name: Plague Rat
Plague Rat.description: A rat with a sickly green glow. It's eyes are red and it's fur is matted with blood.

Plague.description: The rat bites you, you feel a burning sensation in your veins.

Skeleton.name: Skeleton
Skeleton.description: A skeleton with a rusted sword and shield. It's eyes glow with a faint blue light.

Bone Breaker.description: The skeleton swings it's sword at you, you feel a sharp pain in your side.

Greater Skeleton.name: Greater Skeleton
Greater Skeleton.description: A skeleton with a blackened sword and shield. It's eyes glow with a bright blue light.

Bone Breaker.description: The skeleton swings it's sword at you, you feel a sharp pain in your side.

Cultist.name: Cultist
Cultist.description: A cultist with a dark robe and a dagger. It's eyes are hidden behind a mask.

Dark Ritual.description: The cultist chants a dark incantation, you feel a chill run down your spine.
